Original: You will take that request? It is from
Dalla of the Saehrimnir Inn.
[Page]
She wants someone to retrieve an herb
called [Color:6][Item:1225][Color:0], which grows on [Color:5]B1F[Color:0]
of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0].
[Page]
The [Item:1225] supposedly grows [Color:5]deep in
the hidden path at the far north of
B1F[Color:0]. It has a very distinctive scent.
[Page]
The area can be hard to find, so look
closely and carefully at your map.
I shall be awaiting your swift return.
Translation: You will take that request? It is from
Dalla of the Saehrimnir Inn.
[Page]
She wants someone to retrieve an herb
called [Color:6][Item:1225][Color:0], which grows on [Color:5]B1F[Color:0]
of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0].
[Page]
The [Item:1225] supposedly grows [Color:5]deep in
the hidden path at the far north of
B1F[Color:0]. It has a very distinctive scent.
[Page]
The area can be hard to find, so look
closely and carefully at your map.
I shall be awaiting your swift return.

Original: Just after you accept the request,
you recall that you already have a
sample of the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0].
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request,
you can do so now by delivering the
[Number:0].
Translation: Just after you accept the request,
you recall that you already have a
sample of the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0].
[Page]
If you wish to complete the request,
you can do so now by delivering the
[Number:0].

Original: Welcome back. Were you able to get
some [Color:6][Item:1225][Color:0]? Oh... is this it?
[Page]
It is a rather... very well, an
extremely unique scent. Perhaps it
is simply too strong for my tastes.
[Page]
Though I admit to being curious as to
how Dalla plans to use this in a dish.
[Page]
Maybe I will sample some once I
deliver it to her. Would you like
to accompany me there?
Translation: Welcome back. Were you able to get
some [Color:6][Item:1225][Color:0]? Oh... is this it?
[Page]
It is a rather... very well, an
extremely unique scent. Perhaps it
is simply too strong for my tastes.
[Page]
Though I admit to being curious as to
how Dalla plans to use this in a dish.
[Page]
Maybe I will sample some once I
deliver it to her. Would you like
to accompany me there?

Original: As you explore the hidden path,
you notice plants at your feet with
a strange odor.
[Page]
You suddenly recall the quest having
to do with retrieving some [Color:6][Item:1225][Color:0],
an herb with a distinctive scent.
[Page]
This plant growing at your feet must
be the very same. You could complete
the request by gathering some.
Translation: As you explore the hidden path,
you notice plants at your feet with
a strange odor.
[Page]
You suddenly recall the quest having
to do with retrieving some [Color:6][Item:1225][Color:0],
an herb with a distinctive scent.
[Page]
This plant growing at your feet must
be the very same. You could complete
the request by gathering some.

Original: After carefully wrapping the plants
up against damage, you go back the
way you came and deliver them.
Translation: After carefully wrapping the plants
up against damage, you go back the
way you came and deliver them.

Original: You are suddenly reminded of the
request you undertook to deliver
the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]...
[Page]
It is in your pack even now. If you
mean to fulfill the request, you must
be careful not to sell it.
Translation: You are suddenly reminded of the
request you undertook to deliver
the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]...
[Page]
It is in your pack even now. If you
mean to fulfill the request, you must
be careful not to sell it.
